title: @kateykhaos Nami Chroma bug still here!!!!!!!!!!!
body: It's weird her bubble is the right particle but nothing else is. She still hs plain blue water under her, her W is still normal, her E still has no fish, and same with ult no fish or color change!!

replies.body:
Hiya H2ojames -

I was actually looking for you on the boards to give you an update on this. With the movement of the SKT skins into patches where we already had content scheduled, we've been a bit full in terms of resources. 

I do apologize for the extremely long wait on this (you and I both feel the frustration here, as we both use this chroma pack a lot). We have it officially scheduled to be resolved. I'd be happy to give you more information as soon as we lock down a patch.

Okay stellar thank you so much!!

Blu Koi Chroma is my my fav Nami skin so !

thanks so much for taking the time out to reply to me! 

ps I lov Deep Sea Nami it's so badass
